alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Orange; Perry (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 9:23PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Crawford, northern Perry and southern Orange Counties through 1000 PM EDT/900 PM CDT/... At 923 PM EDT/823 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles southwest of Paoli to 10 miles west of English to 12 miles northeast of Santa Claus. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... English. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight EDT/1100 PM CDT/ for south central Indiana.
